SLIDE1.TITLE: Welcome to HRKLIX
SLIDE1.DESCRIPTION: HRKLIX is an intuitive human resource management platform designed to simplify employee administration. From attendance tracking to payroll and leave management, we provide all the tools your business needs to stay organized and efficient. Empower your team with streamlined HR processes and focus on driving success.

SLIDE2.TITLE: HRKLIX
SLIDE2.DESCRIPTION: HRKLIX gives you a complete HR solution, offering automated payroll, robust employee self-service (ESS) features, and comprehensive management tools. With ESS, employees can update their personal details, manage leave requests, access pay slips, and much more. Simplify HR processes while empowering your workforce to take control of their own administrative tasks.

SLIDE3.TITLE: Freemium
SLIDE3.DESCRIPTION: Experience HRKLIX in action with our Freemium! The Freemium allows you to navigate the platform just like you would in a real work environment, helping you discover how HRKLIX can streamline your HR processes. Click here and try it now and see how easy managing your HR tasks can be!

BENEFITS.PROFILE_MANAGEMENT: With the HRKLIX ESS Mobile App, employees can easily manage their profiles, request time off, and view payslips directly from their smartphones.
BENEFITS.COMMUNICATION: This intuitive app enhances communication and streamlines HR processes, allowing staff to access important information at their fingertips.
BENEFITS.KEY_FEATURES: Key features include leave requests, personal details management, and real-time notifications to keep everyone informed and engaged.

MODULES.EM_DESCRIPTION: HRKLIX’s employee management module keeps all staff information in one place for easy access. HR teams can update records, track leave, manage work status, organize shifts, and store important documents. This system helps businesses stay organized and make better decisions by keeping everything in one platform.
MODULES.AT_DESCRIPTION: HRKLIX’s attendance system uses GPS and facial recognition to track employees accurately. It automates lateness deductions, supports different attendance policies, and works for remote and multi-location teams. This reduces manual work and makes attendance tracking easier and more reliable.
MODULES.PR_DESCRIPTION: HRKLIX makes payroll simple by automatically calculating salaries based on attendance, benefits, deductions, and loans. Employees can request advances or loans, with payments adjusted in their payslips. The system also tracks expenses and generates financial reports, helping businesses manage payroll and finances in one place.
